title: 7 Holby City spoilers: Max clashes with Serena but offers hope to Ric
text:
Ric considers his options (Picture: BBC)

Serena (Catherine Russell) returns to Holby City after a few weeks away and instantly clashes with neurosurgeon Max McGerry (Jo Martin), who’s on AAU to see a patient Serena is also treating. Will the two of them be able to work together to help their patient? Serena is also confused about why Ric (Hugh Quarshie) is on admin duties when the ward is so busy. Will Ric tell her what’s wrong?

Essie (Kaye Wragg) has mixed feelings when Frankie (Sophie Harkness) reappears and insists she wants to take Isla back. Essie isn’t entirely convinced that Frankie is ready – but is she really thinking about what’s best for Isla? Here are all the spoilers to look out for.

1. There’s heartbreak in store for Essie when Frankie returns. She says she’s sorted out her life and is ready to take her baby back – but is she really? Essie notices one or two things that give her cause for concern and she asks Sacha (Bob Barrett) to get involved.

2. Chloe (Amy Lennox) returns to work, sure that everyone is talking about what happened with Evan. She can’t help thinking about his death, but when she talks to Cameron (Nic Jackman) about it he surprises her with an unexpected revelation.

Max makes her presence felt (Picture: BBC)

3. Serena’s return to work is unsettled by the presence of Max McGerry, a consultant neurosurgeon at St James’s. Max and Serena are instantly at odds over who takes precedence on the case they’re both working on. When Serena sees Max talking to Ric about some MRI scan results she isn’t prepared for what she discovers.

4. If you’ve ever wanted to see Jac Naylor (Rosie Marcel) dressed as Elsa from Frozen, this may be your only chance. But how was her trip to Disneyland?

5. Essie and Sacha have their work cut out with a charming patient who arrives with a police escort. Essie is worried that he’s not telling them the full story – and it turns out she might be right.

Serena clashes with Max (Picture: BBC)

6. Cameron is still feeling guilty over his actions at the time of Evan’s death and still jumps whenever he sees a police officer. Worse still, he feels like he might be causing Chloe more pain.

7. With Ric desperate to get the best treatment possible for his brain tumour, he seeks the help of Max, who offers an option that’s terrifyingly risky. What will Ric decide to do?
